item.description: Don't miss this suberb adaptation of John LeCarre's classic spy novel of Cold War deception and betrayal. The head of the British secret service (John Hurt) has reliable information that one of his inner circle of trusted spies (including Smiley, played by Gary Oldman) may be a mole for the Russians. When both Smiley and his boss are pushed out, he must try to uncover the true identity of the traitor.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy
